name: task-4
description: - Make sure you have installed `Node.js` and `EOSIO` on your server. If you haven't, you can install them by running the following commands in the terminal: ``` sudo apt update sudo apt install nodejs npm sudo apt-get install -y eosio ``` - Next, create a new Node.js project by running the following command in the terminal: ``` mkdir myproject cd myproject npm init -y ``` - Install ineryjs and dotenv by running the following command: ``` npm install ineryjs dotenv ``` - Copy your contract code to the `rpcindex.mjs` file inside your project directory.
